TextView.android:text: Question 1
What should you do if you see a pedestrian crossing the road?
Correct Answer: Stop the vehicle and let them cross
Question 2
What should you do before changing lanes?
Correct Answer: Check your mirrors and blind spot
Question 3
What should you do if you miss your exit on a highway?
Correct Answer: Continue to the next exit
Question 4
What is the minimum safe following distance in good conditions?
Correct Answer: Two seconds
Question 5
What should you do if your vehicle starts to skid?
Correct Answer: Steer in the direction of the skid
Question 6
When must you use your headlights?
Correct Answer: Between sunset and sunrise
Question 7
What should you do if your brakes fail while driving?
Correct Answer: Pump the brakes, use the parking brake, and downshift to lower gears
Question 8
What should you do at a flashing red traffic light?
Correct Answer: Stop and proceed when safe
Question 9
What is the maximum speed limit in a residential area unless otherwise posted?
Correct Answer: 30 km/h (or as per local regulations)
Question 10
What should you do if you are involved in a minor accident with no injuries?
Correct Answer: Exchange information and report to the police
Question 11
What should you do if you see an emergency vehicle with flashing lights approaching?
Correct Answer: Pull over to the side of the road and stop
Question 12
What is the blood alcohol concentration (BAC) limit for most drivers?
Correct Answer: 0.08% (or as per local regulations)
Question 13
What should you do if you experience a tire blowout while driving?
Correct Answer: Hold the steering wheel firmly, slow down gradually, and pull off the road
Question 14
What should you do when approaching a school bus with flashing red lights?
Correct Answer: Stop and do not proceed until the lights stop flashing
Question 15
What is the purpose of seat belts?
Correct Answer: To keep occupants safe during a collision
Question 16
When should you use your turn signals?
Correct Answer: Before turning or changing lanes
Question 17
What should you do if you see a stopped vehicle with hazard lights on?
Correct Answer: Slow down and proceed with caution
Question 18
When is it legal to pass another vehicle on the right?
Correct Answer: When the vehicle is turning left and there is enough room
Question 19
What should you do at a railroad crossing with no signals?
Correct Answer: Stop, look, and listen for trains
Question 20
What should you do if you are being tailgated?
Correct Answer: Move to the right lane and let the vehicle pass
Question 21
What is the first thing you should do if your car breaks down on the highway?
Correct Answer: Move your vehicle to the shoulder of the road
Question 22
When must you yield the right of way to a pedestrian?
Correct Answer: Always at pedestrian crossings
Question 23
What should you do if you see a school zone sign?
Correct Answer: Slow down and watch for children
Question 24
When is it illegal to overtake another vehicle?
Correct Answer: On a curve or hill where visibility is limited
Question 25
What should you do if your car starts to hydroplane?
Correct Answer: Ease off the accelerator and steer in the direction you want to go
Question 26
What should you do if you see a yield sign?
Correct Answer: Slow down and be prepared to stop
Question 27
What should you do if you see a cyclist on the road?
Correct Answer: Slow down and give them space
Question 28
What should you do when driving in foggy conditions?
Correct Answer: Use low beam headlights and drive slowly
Question 29
What should you do if you encounter an aggressive driver?
Correct Answer: Avoid eye contact and do not engage
Question 30
When is it safe to return to your lane after passing another vehicle?
Correct Answer: When you can see the entire front of the vehicle in your rearview mirror
Question 31
What should you do if your car starts to overheat?
Correct Answer: Turn off the air conditioning and pull over to let the engine cool down
Question 32
What should you do at a yellow traffic light?
Correct Answer: Prepare to stop if it is safe to do so
Question 33
What should you do if you approach a roundabout?
Correct Answer: Yield to traffic already in the roundabout
Question 34
What should you do if you see a road hazard ahead?
Correct Answer: Slow down and proceed with caution
Question 35
When should you use your horn?
Correct Answer: To alert other drivers of your presence
Question 36
What should you do if you see a fire truck with flashing lights approaching?
Correct Answer: Pull over and let it pass
Question 37
What should you do if you are blinded by oncoming headlights?
Correct Answer: Look to the right edge of the road
Question 38
What should you do if you see a slow-moving vehicle sign?
Correct Answer: Reduce speed and be patient
Question 39
When is it permissible to use a cell phone while driving?
Correct Answer: Only when using a hands-free device
Question 40
What should you do if you approach an intersection with malfunctioning traffic lights?
Correct Answer: Treat it as a four-way stop
Question 41
When must you stop for a school bus?
Correct Answer: When it has its stop sign extended and red lights flashing
Question 42
What should you do if you see a police officer directing traffic?
Correct Answer: Follow the officer's instructions
Question 43
What should you do if your headlights fail at night?
Correct Answer: Pull over and stop, using your hazard lights
Question 44
What should you do if you are involved in an accident with injuries?
Correct Answer: Call emergency services and provide assistance if safe
Question 45
What should you do when entering a freeway?
Correct Answer: Accelerate to match the speed of traffic and merge safely
Question 46
When is it illegal to drive under the influence of alcohol?
Correct Answer: Always, it is illegal to drive under the influence
Question 47
What should you do if you see a construction zone?
Correct Answer: Slow down and follow any posted instructions
Question 48
What should you do if you experience a tire blowout?
Correct Answer: Hold the steering wheel firmly, slow down gradually, and pull over safely
Question 49
What should you do if you approach a pedestrian walking along the road?
Correct Answer: Slow down and give them plenty of space
Question 50
What should you do if your car starts to skid on ice?
Correct Answer: Steer in the direction you want to go and avoid braking suddenly
